sources.name: container.style.ts
container.tsx
index.ts
sources.content:
export * from "./container.style"
export {
  ContainerBody,
  ContainerFooter,
  ContainerHeader,
  ContainerPropsContext,
  ContainerRoot,
  useContainerPropsContext,
} from "./container"
export type {
  ContainerBodyProps,
  ContainerFooterProps,
  ContainerHeaderProps,
  ContainerRootProps,
} from "./container"
export * as Container from "./namespace"

sources.name: namespace.ts
sources.content:
export type {
  ContainerBodyProps as BodyProps,
  ContainerFooterProps as FooterProps,
  ContainerHeaderProps as HeaderProps,
  ContainerRootProps as RootProps,
} from "./container"
export {
  ContainerBody as Body,
  ContainerFooter as Footer,
  ContainerHeader as Header,
  ContainerPropsContext as PropsContext,
  ContainerRoot as Root,
  useContainerPropsContext as usePropsContext,
} from "./container"
